content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of a stone furnace with 27 coal as fuel, positioned at (62.0, -54.0) and has a status of NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Offshore Pump at position (107.5, -33.5)
Consists of an offshore pump, positioned at (107.5, -33.5), with a pipe at (107.5, -34.5) and a pipe at (108.5, -34.5) as neighbours.

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of a boiler, positioned at (111.5, -32.0), with pipes at (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -33.5), (111.5, -33.5), (112.5, -33.5), and (113.5, -33.5) as neighbours.

### Steam Engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a steam engine, positioned at (117.5, -30.5), with pipes at (115.5, -33.5), (116.5, -33.5), and (117.5, -33.5) as neighbours, and a small electric pole at (119.5, -30.5).

### Pipe Group for Water at position (107.5, -34.5)
Consists of a pipe group with pipes at (107.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -33.5), and (109.5, -31.5).

### Pipe Group for Steam at position (117.5, -34.5)
Consists of a pipe group with pipes at (117.5, -34.5), (118.5, -34.5), (119.5, -34.5), and multiple other pipes.

### Belt at position (63.5, -52.5)
Consists of a transport belt from (63.5, -52.5) to (63.5, -54.5).

### Belt at position (64.5, -52.5)
Consists of a transport belt from (64.5, -52.5) to (64.5, -54.5).

# ERROR TIPS
* Errors when inserting coal into the boiler: Ensure you have coal in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the boiler.
* Errors when the boiler is out of fuel: Ensure the boiler has fuel before attempting to use it.
* Errors when the steam engine has no input liquid: Ensure the steam engine has a liquid input before attempting to use it.
* Errors when the steam engine has no fluid present in connections: Ensure the steam engine has fluid present in its connections before attempting to use it.

# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* Important variables:
  * transport-belt: 8
  * small-electric-pole: 1
  * wood: 7
  * iron-ore: 10
  * copper-ore: 10
  * iron-plate: 7
  * copper-plate: 5
  * copper-cable: 2
  * iron-gear-wheel: 2
